mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.domian AS "domian"
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM t_d_sites a
AND a.id LIKE '%'||#{id}||'%' '%'+#{id}+'%' concat('%',#{id},'%')
AND a.name LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%' '%'+#{name}+'%' concat('%',#{name},'%')
AND a.domian LIKE '%'||#{domian}||'%' '%'+#{domian}+'%' concat('%',#{domian},'%')
ORDER BY ${page.orderBy}
SELECT COUNT(IP)FROM t_d_counts a ,t_d_sites b WHERE a.SITEID=b.ID AND a.TIME='2016/11/5' AND a.IP='68.160.194.10'

SELECT d.id, d.domian, IFNULL(s.views, 0) views, IFNULL(s.ip,0) ip, IFNULL(s.custom,0) custom, IFNULL(s2.views, 0) views2, IFNULL(s2.ip,0) ip2, IFNULL(s2.custom,0) custom2 FROM t_d_sites d LEFT JOIN (SELECT siteid, COUNT(1) views, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) ip, COUNT(DISTINCT sessionid) custom FROM t_d_counts a WHERE a.TIME = #{currentDate} GROUP BY a.SITEID, a.TIME) s ON d.id = s.siteid LEFT JOIN (SELECT siteid, COUNT(1) views, COUNT(DISTINCT ip) ip, COUNT(DISTINCT sessionid) custom FROM t_d_counts a WHERE a.TIME = #{lastDate} GROUP BY a.SITEID, a.TIME) s2 ON d.id = s2.siteid
